DOC.brief_summary: Study is to investigate the use of the Toronto Western Spasmodic Torticollis Rating Scale (TWSTRS) scale in a cervical dystonia population treated with botulinum toxin type A, and placebo.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Safety, Efficacy of Botulinum Toxin Type A in Patients With Cervical Dystonia
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of cervical dystonia Current or previous botulinum toxin treatment of any type for any condition
